fields.name: No Pick
fields.description: You haven't made a pick yet

fields.name: Home Win
fields.description: If the Home Team wins, you get 1 point

fields.name: Visitor Win
fields.description: If the Visiting Team wins, you get 1 point

fields.name: Within Three
fields.description: If the score at the end of Regulation is between 1 and 3 (inclusive) [score >=1 and <=3], you get 2 points

fields.name: Regulation Tie
fields.description: If the score is tied at the end of Regulation Time, you get 3 points

fields.name: Overtime Tie
fields.description: If the game goes into Overtime and remains tied, you get 5 points
